components.name: Capistrano CLI
components.description: The command-line interface that users interact with to initiate deployment tasks.

components.name: Deployment Scripts
components.description: Custom scripts written in Rake that define the steps for deployment, including server roles and tasks.

components.name: SSH Connection
components.description: The secure shell connection used to communicate with remote servers for executing deployment tasks.

components.name: Remote Servers
components.description: The servers where applications are deployed, which can have different roles such as web server, database server, etc.

data_flows.description: User commands are translated into deployment tasks executed by the scripts.
Deployment tasks are executed on remote servers via SSH commands.
Commands are sent to remote servers to perform deployment actions.

trust_boundaries.name: User to Deployment Environment
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the user executing deployment commands and the remote servers where deployments occur.
